Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 251st overall pick, by Baltimore in 2013...
Injured on 8/13/2014 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Traded from Baltimore to Colorado on 1/31/2017 (Going to COL: P R. Hoerner, RF D. Peets. Going to BAL: P H. Street)...
Released by Colorado on 6/9/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 7/31/2020 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Houston to Toronto on 6/5/2022 (Going to TOR: P J. Lheureux, DH E. Lake Jr., RF D. Peets, CF A. Marin. Going to HOU: P H. Gumbert Jr., SS C. Seager, P N. Villar)...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/15/2022, off Michael Smith (TB)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/3/2022, off Joe Wieland (SEA)...
